import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {Customer} from "./app.model"; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.view.html', }) export class CustomerComponent { title = 'Customer-UI'; CustomerModel : Customer = new Customer(); CustomerModels: Array = new Array(); Add(){ this.CustomerModels.push(this.CustomerModel); this.CustomerModel = new Customer();// clear the UI } }
